did.unittitle: Four Images (originals and copies) of McCown Springs, near Williamsville, Bath County, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Images are contemporary copies of scrapbook photographs that likely dated between 1920 and 1950. One image shows a wooden gazebo. The other shows a hotel-like dwelling with a covered porch. McCown Springs was also known as All Healing Springs. Original source of photographs is unknown. Copies were made by Special Collections staff. Also included are two original photos.
